contraindication.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had an adverse reaction to a vaccine component.

contraindication.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of ebola
contraindication.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of ebola vaccine.

contraindication.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction to rice protein
contraindication.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to rice protein.

indication.description: Administer to persons responding to an outbreak of Ebola Virus Disease.

observationCode.text: Health care personnel at federally designated Ebola treatement center in U.S.

indication.description: Administer to persons working as health care personnel at federally designated Ebola treatement centers in the Unied States

observationCode.text: Laboratorians or other staff at biosafety level 4 facilities in U.S.

indication.description: Administer to persons working as Laboratorians or other staff at biosafety level 4 facilities in U.S.
